Room.Name: Main Courtyard West
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the garden entrance of the main courtyard in Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: The garden lies further to the west through a small gate set in a fence. A great stone turret stands at the corner of the courtyard here, and a stairwell winds around the outside of it, seemingly going forever, since it disappears into the mist above. The courtyard continues to the north, south and east from here.
